jobsJson.descriptionPlain: We are currently seeking an Accounts Payable Executive to be based in our Singapore finance team. The AP Associate reports to the AP Accountant.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Review and verify validity of claims, vendor invoices, corporate card and other expenditure items against Group procurement policies
  • Coordinate closely with ops team to review and reconcile payments to contractors
  • Accurately executing payment transfers in bank portals including in line with stated SLAs
  • Liaising with stakeholders to resolve any vendor inconsistencies/ disputes
  • Administration and retention of documents in line with local regulatory requirements
  • Accurate recording of expenses and tax codes into SAP
  • Assist in the preparation of monthly / audit schedules relating to AP
  • Assist in other ad-hoc reporting requirements

• Diploma level qualification in Accounting / Business / ACCA
  • Fresh graduates welcome to apply
  • Experience in AP is a plus
  • Proficient in SAP FI
  • Proficient in Excel 
  • Prior working experience in an Ecommerce company a plus 
  • Able to work independently with high attention to detail
